name: Avatar
description: An Avatar component is a graphical representation used to identify users or entities within an application's interface.

properties.name: imageUrl
properties.label: Image URL
properties.settingTooltip: The source URL for the avatar image.
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the source URL for the avatar image.

properties.name: shape
properties.label: Shape
properties.settingTooltip: Select the shape of the avatar container.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.settingTooltip: The width of the avatar container.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.settingTooltip: The height of the avatar container.

properties.name: smartImageFit
properties.label: Smart Image Fit
properties.settingTooltip: Display image according to its height and width.

properties.name: emptyLabel
properties.label: Empty Label
properties.settingTooltip: Define the label content when the source is not set.

properties.name: changeLabel
properties.label: Change Label
properties.defaultValue: Do you want to change this image?
properties.settingTooltip: Define the label content when there is a valid source set.

properties.name: alt
properties.label: Alt
properties.settingTooltip: Define an alternative text description of the image.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.label: Read Only
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine whether the component allows the user to change the avatar image.
properties.settingTooltip: Disable the ability to change the avatar image.

eventHandlers.name: onChange
eventHandlers.label: On Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when an avatar image is changed.

eventHandlers.name: onUpload
eventHandlers.label: On Upload Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when an image file is selected for upload.

eventHandlers.name: onError
eventHandlers.label: On Error Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when an error occurred on loading the image.
